entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
